title: Team Trump Torches the Environment for Big Business | Michael Scott Moore
itunes:title: Team Trump Torches the Environment for Big Business | Michael Scott Moore
description:
A Japanese firm converts women's armpits into ad space, the Trump administration takes aim at environmental laws, and Michael Scott Moore discusses "The Desert and the Sea."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
